#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/person-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/Person \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"Person","id":"649544f9-f3ca-4f86-8af3-5957ca28f0eb","identifier":[{"use":"usual","type":{"coding":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0203","code":"MR"}]},"system":"urn:oid:1.2.36.146.595.217.0.1","value":"12345","period":{"start":"2001-05-06T08:00:00+08:00"},"assigner":{"display":"Acme Healthcare"}}],"name":[{"use":"official","family":"Chalmers","given":["Peter","James"]},{"use":"usual","given":["Jim"]}],"telecom":[{"use":"home"},{"system":"phone","value":"(03) 5555 6473","use":"work"},{"system":"email","value":"Jim@example.org","use":"home"}],"gender":"male","birthDate":"1974-12-25","address":[{"use":"home","line":["534 Erewhon St"],"city":"PleasantVille","state":"Vic","postalCode":"3999"}],"active":true,"link":[{"target":{"reference":"RelatedPerson/peter","display":"Peter Chalmers"}},{"target":{"reference":"Patient/example","display":"Peter Chalmers"}}],"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:18.710+08:00"}}'

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
javascript Axios

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text

parameters.name: address-city
parameters.description: A city specified in an address

parameters.name: address-country
parameters.description: A country specified in an address

parameters.name: address-postalcode
parameters.description: A postal code specified in an address

parameters.name: address-state
parameters.description: A state specified in an address

parameters.name: address-use
parameters.description: A use code specified in an address

parameters.name: birthdate
parameters.description: The person's date of birth

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: A value in an email contact

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: The gender of the person

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: A person Identifier

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: Any link has this Patient, Person, RelatedPerson or Practitioner reference

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization at which this person record is being managed

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The Person links to this Patient

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: A value in a phone contact

parameters.name: phonetic
parameters.description: A portion of name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm

parameters.name: practitioner
parameters.description: The Person links to this Practitioner

parameters.name: relatedperson
parameters.description: The Person links to this RelatedPerson

parameters.name: telecom
parameters.description: The value in any kind of contact

    <entry>
        <fullUrl value="http://burni.example.com/fhir/Person/649544f9-f3ca-4f86-8af3-5957ca28f0eb"/>
